mapper.sql: goods_id, take_id, order_id, ori_goods_id, shop_id, line_no, goods_name, category_name, category_code, brand_name, brand_code, product_type, bar_code, unit, convert_qty, convert_unit, market_price, origin_sale_price, sku, qty, ori_qty, max_qty, sale_price, enabled, memo, created_time, property, ori_inv_qty
mapper.select: SELECT c.goods_name as goods_name, c.category_name as category_name, c.category_code as category_code, c.brand_name as brand_name, c.brand_code as brand_code, c.property as property, c.product_type as product_type, c.bar_code as bar_code, c.unit as unit, c.convert_qty as convert_qty, c.convert_unit as convert_unit, c.market_price as market_price, c.origin_sale_price as origin_sale_price, c.order_id as order_id, c.ori_goods_id as ori_goods_id, c.ori_qty as ori_qty, c.ori_inv_qty as ori_inv_qty, sum(c.ori_inv_qty - c.taked_qty) as max_qty, 0 as qty, c.sale_price as sale_price, c.shop_id as shop_id, c.sku as sku from ( SELECT goods_name as goods_name, category_name as category_name, category_code as category_code, brand_name as brand_name, brand_code as brand_code, property as property, product_type as product_type, bar_code as bar_code, unit as unit, convert_qty as convert_qty, convert_unit as convert_unit, market_price as market_price, origin_sale_price as origin_sale_price, order_id as order_id, ori_goods_id as ori_goods_id, ori_qty as ori_qty, ori_inv_qty as ori_inv_qty, sum(qty) as taked_qty, sale_price as sale_price, shop_id as shop_id, sku as sku from bus_take_goods where enabled = 1 and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY order_id, sku ) as c GROUP BY c.order_id, c.sku
mapper.insert: insert into bus_take_goods (goods_id, take_id, order_id, ori_goods_id, shop_id, line_no, goods_name, category_name, category_code, brand_name, brand_code, product_type, bar_code, unit, convert_qty, convert_unit, market_price, origin_sale_price, sku, qty, ori_qty, max_qty, sale_price, enabled, memo, created_time, property, ori_inv_qty) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriGoodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{convertQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{convertUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{originSalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oriQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriInvQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
